description: A renowned diver from Fontaine, Freminet is a Cryo claymore user who excels at physical damage and sustained DPS.
info: Freminet is a physical DPS who excels at sustained damage with his claymore and Cryo application. Build him for Physical DMG Bonus, CRIT, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Pressurized Floe
skills.desc: Freminet executes a rapid dash, dealing Cryo DMG and entering the Pers Timer state, increasing his resistance to interruption and enabling special attacks.
skills.details_html:
Pressurized Floe
Executes a rapid dash, dealing Cryo DMG and entering the Pers Timer state, increasing resistance to interruption and enabling special attacks. Consecutive attacks increase Pers Timer stacks, enhancing damage.

skills.name: Shadowhunter's Ambush
skills.desc: Freminet unleashes a powerful attack, dealing AoE Physical DMG and ending the Pers Timer state.
skills.details_html:
Shadowhunter's Ambush
Unleashes a powerful attack, dealing AoE Physical DMG and ending the Pers Timer state. Damage scales with the number of Pers Timer stacks consumed.

passive_talents.name: Deepwater Navigation
passive_talents.desc: Increases underwater movement speed for all party members by 15%.

passive_talents.name: Pressure Maintenance
passive_talents.desc: When Freminet triggers a Frozen reaction, his ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Diver's Endurance
passive_talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Fontaine, the time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Chilling Dive
constellations.desc: When Freminet triggers a Frozen reaction, his CRIT Rate is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Tide's Embrace
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Pressurized Floe by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Hunter
constellations.desc: Shadowhunter's Ambush deals 30% more DMG to enemies affected by Cryo.

constellations.name: Ocean's Resolve
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Shadowhunter's Ambush by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unyielding Current
constellations.desc: When Freminet's HP falls below 50%, his Physical DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.
